attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should create an English Advisory Group to look at the welfare of the English person.
It is now more acceptable to be a foreigner in England and the UK. The native English person is becoming a rare thing. The rights of the English person are disappearing minute by minute.
Let's look at how we can bring back our Christian laws and values.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
